data.title: Inscribed Photograph
data.meta_description: 1960. 9.5 x 7.5 inches, no place, no date, circa 1960 -- a black-and-white image of the President smoking his favorite pipe. Inscribed With the kind regards of Herbert Hoover. Harris and Ewing Studios no back stamp . Small pen notation in another hand above the inscription. Good condition. Binding: Unbound Language: English
data.text:
I received my book by Frans Masereel in the mail this afternoon. I couldn't be more delighted. It's in excellent condition, and your shipping and customer service were first rate. This was my first experience purchasing a rare book online -- thanks for making it a good one.

C. Funk

Thank YOU sir! My Dad really wanted this book! My folks just bought a place in Spain, and I looked all over for this book! I'm so glad that I found it, can't wait to see his face on Christmas! Being that it's so old, he never thought he'd get one. Again, thank you!

Juanita T.
